mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Just as Heimdal guards the rainbow bridge Bifr√∂st in Norse mythology, we serve as the guardian of the digital realm for LARP communities worldwide. Our mission is simple: remove the barriers that prevent amazing stories from reaching their audiences.
mission.challenges: Too many brilliant LARP organizers hesitate to share their creations online due to technical complexity or hosting costs. We bridge that gap, providing free, professional web hosting so you can focus on what you do best: creating unforgettable experiences.
mission.vision: Every LARP deserves a digital home where participants can gather, prepare, and reminisce. We make that possible, one subdomain at a time.

offer.title: What We Offer
offer.hosting: Free hosting with zero hidden costs

who.title: Who We Are
who.description: We are a passionate collective of LARP enthusiasts, web developers, and storytellers who understand the unique needs of the LARP community. Having organized, participated in, and supported countless LARPs ourselves, we know the challenges you face. From managing player communications to showcasing your creative vision, we've been there. Our technical expertise combined with our understanding of the LARP community's unique needs allows us to provide this free hosting service.

creator.title: Meet the Creator
creator.description: Heimdal Portal is created and maintained by Mads Heimdal Thy, a passionate software engineer with extensive experience in building apps, websites, and systems. With a deep love for both technology and storytelling, Mads combines technical expertise with an understanding of the LARP community's unique needs to provide this free hosting service.
creator.background: As both a software engineer and storytelling enthusiast, Mads understands the challenges facing LARP organizers in the digital age. His vision for Heimdal Portal stems from a desire to democratize access to professional web hosting, ensuring that every LARP community can have a digital presence worthy of their creative endeavors.
creator.mission: Through Heimdal Portal, Mads aims to strengthen the global LARP community by providing the technical foundation that allows organizers to focus on what they do best: creating immersive, transformative experiences for players around the world.
